short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tells if visited sites have vulnerability disclosure programs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tells if visited sites have vulnerability disclosure programs. It will check the domains your are visiting against an offline version of FireBounty databases and also displaying available security.txt.
